actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Employment and Productivity.

official_title: A joint resolution to recognize the importance of the role of the Bureau of Apprenticeship and Training of the Department of Labor in promoting apprenticeship programs.

summary.text: States that the Congress recognizes the effectiveness of apprenticeship training in developing a skilled work force and commends the Bureau of Apprenticeship and Training for its role in promoting apprenticeship programs.

titles.title: A joint resolution to recognize the importance of the role of the Bureau of Apprenticeship and Training of the Department of Labor in promoting apprenticeship programs.
